system.availability: To use make +0 Weapon Skill Test, on success user latches to protruding object within 5 metres. Grapplewhip can then retract to pull object to person or vice versa. Can be used as Exotic Melee Weapon. Without proper training, missed attacks hit the user in random location.
system.cost: Weapon Stats: Melee; 5m; 1d10+2 R; Pen 0; Flexible; Snare
